mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_point (grade_id, category_id, point_name, point_code, description, content, difficulty_level, sort_order, prerequisite_points, learning_objectives, create_at, create_by, update_at, update_by, delete_flag) VALUES (#{gradeId}, #{categoryId}, #{pointName}, #{pointCode}, #{description}, #{content}, #{difficultyLevel}, #{sortOrder}, #{prerequisitePoints}, #{learningObjectives}, NOW(), #{createBy}, NOW(), #{updateBy}, 'N')

mapper.select: SELECT kp.id AS kp_id, kp.grade_id AS kp_grade_id, kp.category_id AS kp_category_id, kp.point_name AS kp_point_name, kp.point_name_fr AS kp_point_name_fr, kp.point_code AS kp_point_code, kp.description AS kp_description, kp.description_fr AS kp_description_fr, kp.content AS kp_content, kp.content_fr AS kp_content_fr, kp.icon_url AS kp_icon_url, kp.icon_class AS kp_icon_class, kp.difficulty_level AS kp_difficulty_level, kp.sort_order AS kp_sort_order, kp.learning_objectives AS kp_learning_objectives, kp.learning_objectives_fr AS kp_learning_objectives_fr, kp.create_at AS kp_create_at, kp.update_at AS kp_update_at, kc.category_name AS kc_category_name, kc.category_name_fr AS kc_category_name_fr, kc.category_code AS kc_category_code, g.grade_name AS g_grade_name, g.grade_level AS g_grade_level, COALESCE(lp.progress_status, 1) AS lp_progress_status, COALESCE(lp.completion_percentage, 0.00) AS lp_completion_percentage, lp.start_time AS lp_start_time, lp.complete_time AS lp_complete_time, COALESCE(lp.study_duration, 0) AS lp_study_duration, lp.last_study_time AS lp_last_study_time, lp.notes AS lp_notes, CASE kp.difficulty_level WHEN 1 THEN '简单' WHEN 2 THEN '中等' WHEN 3 THEN '困难' ELSE '未知' END AS difficulty_name FROM knowledge_point kp INNER JOIN knowledge_category kc ON kp.category_id = kc.id AND kc.delete_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN grade g ON kp.grade_id = g.id AND g.delete_flag = 'N' LEFT JOIN learning_progress lp ON kp.id = lp.knowledge_point_id AND (lp.user_id = #{userId} OR #{userId} IS NULL) AND lp.delete_flag = 'N' WHERE kp.delete_flag = 'N' AND kp.grade_id = #{gradeId} AND kp.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY kp.sort_order ASC, kp.id ASC
